text: aap unase kah den ki mere paalanahaar ne nyaay ka aadesh diya hai. (aur vo ye hai ki) pratyek masjid mein namaaz ke samay apana dhyaan seedhe usee kee or karo[1] aur usake lie dharm ko vishudhd karake usee ko pukaaro. jis prakaar, usane tumhen pahale paida kiya hai, usee prakaar, (pralay mein) phir jeevit kar diye jaoge
